summary: As I was about to leave the house, and venture into my morning commute, I noticed that episode 117, Not Quite Scheduled. , of Hemispheric Views, was waiting in my Podcast radio

summary:
Hello fellow blogger,
I found your blog and the "Finding my Blogging Voice" post through Bear's 'Most Recent' feed and felt like writing a reply. 
It's wonderful to see that you got your first post out there.  A good and interesting one too, that many bloggers can relate to...
title: Re: Finding my Blogging Voice

summary: Abigail Nussbaum has spent the last couple of decades writing smart, opinionated criticism… but what’s it like, looking back on all those reviews when it comes time to put it together into a collection.  In this Big Idea, the critic casts a critical eye on that criticism, and on how it all comes together, in […]
title: The Big Idea: Abigail Nussbaum
